### Partial Derivative

$$\frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = 2 x \left(x + y\right) e^{x^{2} + y^{2}} + e^{x^{2} + y^{2}}$$

$$\frac{\partial f}{\partial y} = \frac{3 y^{2}}{x^{3} + y^{3}} - \frac{1}{y}$$

$$\frac{\partial^2 f}{\partial x \partial y} = 2 y \left(3 x^{2} + 2 y^{2}\right)$$ $$\frac{\partial f}{\partial x} = 3 x^{2} y^{2} - 6 x y + 2 y^{3}$$

$$\frac{\partial f}{\partial y} = \frac{3 y^{2}}{x^{3} + y^{3}} - \frac{1}{y}$$
